tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Raju Sahetya is by far the best doctor I have ever met. His knowledge, his diagnosis and his medication is par excellence. He explains you everything like a friend and guides you like a Doctor. His son Dr. Ankesh Sahetya is following his father’s footsteps and they together make a great team. God bless them and their family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: The doctor is friendly and has extensive knowledge. He gives proper explanation before going ahead with the treatment. My husband was born here and as per mother-in-law, he has not changed since then. I feel extremely comfortable getting treated from him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have been going to Dr Raju Shahetya for the past 13 years now.Dr has been like a father figure and God to me ,I have never seen a Dr so professional and so kind ...he makes sure that every query you have has been answered and you don't leave the clinic without your doubts been cleared.I have been cured of my PCOS and had the most blissful pregnancy and delivery thru Dr Raju and his son ankesh shahetya.**** *** **** ** *** *** **** *

review: You feel safe as Dr. Raju, he care so much about you and your baby. He explains all the details and listens you very carefully. I recommend you to visit him if you have any kind of gynecological problem.

I went to the doctor for a problem series of blood test was asked then even after 5days of medicines * ***** **** *** *********** ** ** ******* really very unsatisfied. Also to check the reports doctor charge fees that too the full fees ** ****** *********** Contacted him on phone he says increase the dose. *** ** *** ** ** *** ** *** **** would not recommend him to anyone whatsoever
reply_text:
Problems like sexual Dysfunction are quite subjective. 

To the best of ability and efforts all patients do not respond the same. 

Anyway 

Wishing you all the very best and healthy life.

review: Very friendly and explained everything. I felt more like im with family. Didnt feel strange. Doctors took care of me and my unborn baby very very good. Thanx to them i have a healthy little daughter now.
